name: Cowboy Bebop: Tsuioku no Serenade
description: It is the year 2071, and humanity is living in an interplanetary society. A new breed of "cowboy" bounty hunters pursue outlaws across the lawless solar system in the hope of receiving high rewards for the hackers, drug-dealers, and terrorists they capture. As one of three bounty hunters--Spike, Jet, or Faye--you must unravel the mysteries of the Cowboy Bebop story. Use Spike's Jeet Kune Do skills or Jet's bulldog-style fighting techniques to defeat more than 50 different outlaws and then reap the rewards.
